roleset.name: reopening of a wound, usually along suture lines

roles.note: If you have a cause, it should appear as a causal phrase rather than as an arg0 type argument. I can't find examples to warrent an arg 0 but one could be added in the future if found to be possible.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.
